author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The Lenovo Legion Go 2 is everything previous Legion Go owners had been asking for: an even better screen, greatly improved controls, and a 15-20% uplift in performance.  But at nearly double the price of its predecessor, are the upgrades worth these 2025 prices?

More info: https://bestbuy.7tiv.net/YRz3oK

Other videos mentioned:
GPD Win 5 review: https://youtu.be/I9XBZgtG-0E
Legion Go updated review: https://youtu.be/ffL3F07CG8Y
Legion Go comfort grips: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1694780536/comfort-grips-for-lenovo-legion-go-3d

This was a review unit sent to me on loan by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.
